Planar Gateway.name: Planar Gateway
Planar Gateway.fullText:
Bonded Summoner Attack 11Planar Gateway

You create a rift between the planes, drawing raw power through it that tumbles your enemies about like skittles.

Encounter        Arcane, Conjuration, Implement
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Effect: You conjure a planar gateway that occupies 1 square within range and lasts until the end of your next turn. You can use the Planar Gateway Attack power, using the gateway’s square as the origin square.


Revision (10/14/2009)
In the power’s attack component, replace “Free Action” with “Opportunity Action”.

In the Trigger line, replace “in the planar gateway” with “adjacent to the planar gateway.”

Planar Gateway Attack

You create a rift between the planes, drawing raw power through it that tumbles your enemies about like skittles.

Encounter      Arcane, Conjuration, Implement
Opportunity Action      Close burst 1

Requirement: The Planar Gateway power must be active to use this power.

Trigger: A creature starts its turn adjacent to the planar gateway or enters a square adjacent to the planar gateway

Target: The triggering creature in the burst

Attack: Intelligence vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and you slide the target 3 squares.


Revision (10/14/2009)
In the power’s attack component, replace “Free Action” with “Opportunity Action”.

In the Trigger line, replace “in the planar gateway” with “adjacent to the planar gateway.”

Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 117.
Planar Gateway.flavor: You create a rift between the planes, drawing raw power through it that tumbles your enemies about like skittles.

Enduring Summons.name: Enduring Summons
Enduring Summons.fullText:
Bonded Summoner Utility 12Enduring Summons

You call on the power of the planes to surge through your summoned creature, ensuring its survival.

Encounter        Arcane, Healing
Minor Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature you summoned

Effect: The target regains hit points equal to your healing surge value.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 117.
Enduring Summons.flavor: You call on the power of the planes to surge through your summoned creature, ensuring its survival.
Enduring Summons.effect: The target regains hit points equal to your healing surge value.

Summon Bonded Protector.name: Summon Bonded Protector
Summon Bonded Protector.fullText:
Bonded Summoner Attack 20Summon Bonded Protector

You call a massive humanoid-shaped statue of metal and stone that pounds your foes and forces them away from you.

Daily        Arcane, Implement, Summoning, Teleportation
Minor Action      Ranged 20

Effect: You summon a Large bonded protector in an unoccupied 2-square-by-2-square space within range. The bonded protector has reach 2 and a speed of 5. It has a +4 bonus to AC and a +4 bonus to Will. You can give the bonded protector the following special commands.

  Standard Action: Close blast 3; targets each creature in the blast; Intelligence vs. Reflex; 2d4 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

  Opportunity Attack: Melee 1; targets one creature; Intelligence vs. Reflex; 2d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone. The bonded protector can make this opportunity attack against a creature that attacks you or that attacks a creature you summoned.

  Minor Action: You and the bonded protector swap positions.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 117.
Summon Bonded Protector.flavor: You call a massive humanoid-shaped statue of metal and stone that pounds your foes and forces them away from you.
Summon Bonded Protector.effect: You summon a Large bonded protector in an unoccupied 2-square-by-2-square space within range. The bonded protector has reach 2 and a speed of 5. It has a +4 bonus to AC and a +4 bonus to Will. You can give the bonded protector the following special commands.
Summon Bonded Protector.standardAction: Close blast 3; targets each creature in the blast; Intelligence vs. Reflex; 2d4 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Summon Bonded Protector.opportunityAttack: Melee 1; targets one creature; Intelligence vs. Reflex; 2d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone. The bonded protector can make this opportunity attack against a creature that attacks you or that attacks a creature you summoned.
Summon Bonded Protector.minorAction: You and the bonded protector swap positions.
